advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
With Trover, now is always the best time for adventure. Use Trover to visually explore the best of everywhere, whether around the corner or around the world.

Designed for on-the-go discovery, use Trover to find beautiful places, exchange stories, share helpful tips from past journeys, and collect ideas for great places to go from a passionate community of explorers. 

With Trover you can: 

Go On an Instant Adventure 
• Immerse yourself in authentic photos and stories that showcase what’s possible across the globe, in a city nearby, or just around the corner. 

Connect with a Passionate Community of Explorers
• Engage in conversations with a vibrant community. 
• Exchange travel stories and tips with travelers just like you, or seek advice from those who’ve been where you dream of going. 

Use Your Own Lens to Showcase Beauty and Wonder in the World
• Be inspired by other’s discoveries and create visual lists of places you want to explore. 
• Showcase your photos and stories, inspire others to go where you have been. 

Rest Assured Your Newsfeed Won’t Be Clogged with Cats & Selfies
• Because we already get plenty of them in our other favorite apps. 

Connect with us:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/trover
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TroverApp
Google+: http://plus.google.com/+Trover
trackCensoredName: Trover - The Best of Everywhere - Find & Share Great Places
